\chapter{savu-lite installation}
\label{\detokenize{installation:savu-lite-installation}}\label{\detokenize{installation::doc}}

\section{Install Miniconda}
\label{\detokenize{installation:install-miniconda}}
Download Miniconda2-latest-linux-x86\_64.sh and install on local machine


\section{Set-Up Miniconda}
\label{\detokenize{installation:set-up-miniconda}}
conda update conda


\section{Install savu-lite}
\label{\detokenize{installation:install-savu-lite}}
conda install -c savu-dep savu-lite
